DOC.brief_summary: There is a growing body of evidence exploring the role of curcumin as a radioprotector against radiation-induced injury in normal tissues as well as a radiosensitizer in tumor cells. The aim of this study is to determine the efficacy of oral nanocurcumin in prostate cancer patients undergoing radiotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Nanocurcumin for Prostate Cancer Patients Undergoing Radiotherapy (RT)
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate Candidate for External Beam Radiotherapy ECOG performance status 02 Patients with Metastatic Prostate Cancer Patients with Kidney & Liver dysfunction Gastrointestinal disorders such as IBD, reflux and peptic ulcers Any adverse reaction to curcumin
